The Flower Road Life of the Grand Duchess at the End of Time
Life on the Flower Road of the Grand Duchess at the End of Time

La vida de la duquesa trasciende por el camino de las flores

altTitles.zh-hk: 限時大公夫人的花路人生

description.ar:
كانت إيزابيلا ، التي ولدت لتتلقى اللعنة ، على وشك الاختفاء. "هذا الزواج ، سأفعل ذلك." كنت أرغب في التحرر منهم بقدر ما كنت أريد أن أتحرر منهم لحظة وفاتي. في انتظار إيزابيلا في المكان الذي كانت تبحث فيه عن مكان تموت فيه "هاها ... الهي "إيزابيلا ، هل يمكنك مناداتي بأبي؟" كان كرم الضيافة والمودة اللانهائية للأصهار. حتى لو مت ، لن أتركك تذهبين." الهوس المجهول للزوج المرتقب! تتكشف طريق الزهور أمام إيزابيلا التي ماتت.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%9C%ED%95%9C%EB%B6%80-%EB%8C%80%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%90%EB%B9%84%EC%9D%98-%EA%BD%83%EA%B8%B8-%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%ED%94%84/3270), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59274036)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-isabellas-path-to-happiness/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/108554)
description.en:
She was born to received the curse, to disappear. So, she accepted the marriage proposal to be free from her family before she dies but... the hospitality and affection she received from her in-laws are endless and her husband's obsession is mysterious... A flower path unfolds in front of her, who was a time limit!

---
For centuries, the firstborn of House Helsington has been cursed to die young, so the family produces an illegitimate child, Isabella, to take on the curse instead. To get away from her terrible home and live her last days in peace, she wants nothing more than to escape. Her chance comes when Grand Duke Noverdic asks her to marry his son, Cleor. Once she arrives in the north, she is showered with endless affection from both her in-laws and her fiancé... to the point that it's almost suspicious.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%9C%ED%95%9C%EB%B6%80-%EB%8C%80%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%90%EB%B9%84%EC%9D%98-%EA%BD%83%EA%B8%B8-%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%ED%94%84/3270), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59274036)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-isabellas-path-to-happiness/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/108554)
description.fr:
Isabella, née pour recevoir la malédiction, était sur le point de disparaître.

«Ce mariage, je le ferai.»

Je voulais être libre d'eux autant qu'au moment de ma mort. En attendant Isabella à l'endroit où elle a trouvé un endroit pour mourir...

«Ha... c'est une déesse...»

«Isabella, peux-tu m'appeler papa ?»

C'était l'hospitalité et l'affection sans fin de la belle-famille. Et, «Même si tu meurs, je ne te laisserai pas partir.»

L'obsession méconnue du futur mari!

«Isabella, tu es la lumière de notre Nord.»

Une route fleurie se déroule devant Isabella, qui était morte.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%9C%ED%95%9C%EB%B6%80-%EB%8C%80%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%90%EB%B9%84%EC%9D%98-%EA%BD%83%EA%B8%B8-%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%ED%94%84/3270), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59274036)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-isabellas-path-to-happiness/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/108554)
description.id:
Isabella, yang lahir untuk menerima kutukan, sudah waktunya untuk menghilang. "Aku akan mengurus pernikahan itu." Aku ingin bebas dari mereka selama aku mati. Menunggu Isabella di tempat yang aku cari tempat untuk mati…” Ha..Aku seorang dewi…” “Isabella, bisakah kamu memanggilku Ayah?” Itu adalah keramahan dan kasih sayang yang tak ada habisnya dari mertua. Dan, “Bahkan jika kamu mati, Aku tidak akan membiarkanmu pergi." Obsesi suamiku! "Isabella, kamu adalah cahaya dari negara utara kami." Sebuah jalan bunga terbentang di depan Isabella, yang adalah seorang wanita mati.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%9C%ED%95%9C%EB%B6%80-%EB%8C%80%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%90%EB%B9%84%EC%9D%98-%EA%BD%83%EA%B8%B8-%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%ED%94%84/3270), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59274036)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-isabellas-path-to-happiness/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/108554)
description.pt-br:
Isabella nasceu para receber uma maldição e depois disso, já estava prestes a desaparecer. Aquele casamento, eu… Eu vou me casar! Ela queria ser livre, então mesmo à beira da morte ela fez essa escolha. O lugar para onde ele foi parar, estranhamente em vez de se tornar o lugar certo para morrer, acabou sendo a mansão onde recebeu carinho e cuidados. Isabella, você não precisa ser tão formal. Você poderia me chamar de pai? Essa foi a hospitalidade infinita dos seus sogros. Mesmo que você morra, eu não vou deixar você ir. Descobriu a obsessão do seu noivo. Isabella, você é a luz das nossas terras do Norte O trilho das flores, então aparece em frente a Isabella que já se considera à beira da morte.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%9C%ED%95%9C%EB%B6%80-%EB%8C%80%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%90%EB%B9%84%EC%9D%98-%EA%BD%83%EA%B8%B8-%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%ED%94%84/3270), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59274036)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-isabellas-path-to-happiness/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/108554)
description.zh-hk:
生來就被詛咒纏身的伊莎貝拉，感知到了自己生命即將結束。

為了尋找安息之地，她接下了本不屬於自己的婚姻，卻意外感受到了來自婆家人的愛。

未婚夫為什麼對她這般執著？執著到讓她不甘心生命就此結束了。

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%9C%ED%95%9C%EB%B6%80-%EB%8C%80%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%90%EB%B9%84%EC%9D%98-%EA%BD%83%EA%B8%B8-%EB%9D%BC%EC%9D%B4%ED%94%84/3270), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59274036)
